text:
Company Background:
Richardson, Johnson and Thompson is a leading market research firm committed to delivering critical insights to help our clients make informed decisions. We pride ourselves on our inclusive culture and commitment to diversity.

Job Title: Market Researcher

Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled Market Researcher to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for gathering and analyzing market data to help us understand trends and consumer preferences. Your insights will be crucial in guiding our marketing strategies and business decisions.

Responsibilities:
- Collect and analyze data on consumers, competitors, and market conditions.
- Prepare reports and present findings to clients and stakeholders.
- Conduct surveys, focus groups, and interviews.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop research strategies.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or related field.
- Proven experience in market research or a similar role.
- Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $50,000 to $70,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Comprehensive healthcare, including dental and vision coverage.
- Generous parental leave for all new parents.
- Flexible working hours and the option to work remotely.
- Nursing Rooms provide a quiet place for breastfeeding and pumping.
- We strive to maintain a workplace free from discrimination and are proud to be an inclusive employer.
